answerText: Tortilla Flat[10] This author of Tortilla Flat told four tales from the childhood of Jody Tiflin in The Red Pony and described the death of Jim Casy while organizing a strike in The Grapes of Wrath.
heading: Missiles of October |2011 | 10 | 13 | Literature | American | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: In this novel, Pilon, Pablo, and Jesus Maria accidentally burn down the smaller of the houses Danny has inherited. For 10 points each: [10] Name this novel in which Danny gradually comes to live with all of his friends in a house in the title location despite his hatred of property for encroaching on his freedom.
